item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 23, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Phased Array Microphone (2023) (399 points | 147 comments)
2. MaXX Interactive Desktop -- the little brother of the great SGI Desktop on IRIX (62 points | 20 comments)
3. Dear sir, you have built a compiler (2022) (114 points | 38 comments)
4. Show HN: A Marble Madness-inspired WebGL game we built for Netlify (465 points | 186 comments)
5. An Analysis of the Performance of WebSockets in Various Programming Languages (3 points | discuss)
6. RGFW: Single-header C99 window abstraction library (71 points | 15 comments)
7. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (25 points | discuss)
8. Oncall shift should be Tuesday to Tuesday (16 points | 2 comments)
9. Understanding Google's Quantum Error Correction Breakthrough (117 points | 64 comments)
10. Nash equilibria in Ballmer's binary-search interview game (71 points | 16 comments)
11. Show HN: Rebels in the sky – Terminal game about space pirates (172 points | 45 comments)
12. Amazon to invest another $4B in Anthropic (512 points | 286 comments)
13. The Deceptively Asymmetric Unit Sphere (109 points | 25 comments)
14. Translating My Grandfather's Biograpy (74 points | 24 comments)
15. Rendering "modern" Winamp skins in the browser (70 points | 25 comments)
16. FaSTer: Atari ST Digital Magazine (95 points | 22 comments)

18. From string to AST: parsing (2019) (105 points | 19 comments)
19. OK, I can partly explain the LLM chess weirdness now (464 points | 419 comments)
20. Salmon return to lay eggs in historic habitat after dam removal project (316 points | 212 comments)
21. Autoflow, a Graph RAG based and conversational knowledge base tool (230 points | 31 comments)
22. Bayesian Neural Networks (247 points | 52 comments)
23. What's Next for WebGPU (200 points | 181 comments)
24. Playground Wisdom: Threads Beat Async/Await (68 points | 37 comments)
25. Are at-home genetic tests worth it? As an oncologist, here's my advice. (7 points | 13 comments)
26. Wasp (YC W21) is hiring a framework engineer to build Laravel for JavaScript ( | hide)
27. The FORTH code for Chipwits is released in the game's 40th anniversary (232 points | 68 comments)
28. Prince Nico Mbarga’s biggest hit outsold any of The Beatles’ (2017) (53 points | 47 comments)
29. Samurai: Adapting Segment Anything Model for Zero-Shot Visual Tracking (9 points | discuss)
30. A C++ Mixin System (60 points | 29 comments)
